fields.name: archiveDate
fields.description: Date before which logs are archived

fields.name: totalSize
fields.description: Total size in bytes of all logs

fields.name: dataSize
fields.description: Size in bytes of all non-incoming and non-archived logs

fields.name: archiveSize
fields.description: Size in bytes of all archived logs

fields.name: incomingSize
fields.description: Size in bytes of all incoming logs at time of index generation
